Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which Mr. Trump is self-financing his campaign, implying that there are no donors at all.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as it contradicts the fact that thousands of donors have provided about one-third of Donald Trump's campaign resources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that self-financing means there are no donors, which is not accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, which is that Mr. Trump has both self-financed his campaign and received contributions from donors.
